00029 #include <cassert>
00030 
00031 #include "ProgressReporter.hpp"
00032 #include "Exception.hpp"
00033 
00034 ProgressReporter::ProgressReporter(std::string outputDirectory, double startTime, double endTime)
00035     : mStartTime(startTime),
00036       mEndTime(endTime),
00037       mLastPercentage(UINT_MAX)
00038 {
00039     assert(startTime < endTime);
00040 
00041     // note we make sure we don't delete anything in the output directory
00042     OutputFileHandler handler(outputDirectory, false);
00043     mpFile = handler.OpenOutputFile("progress_status.txt");
00044 }
00045 
00046 ProgressReporter::~ProgressReporter()
00047 {
00048     if (mLastPercentage!=100)
00049     {
00050         *mpFile << "100% completed" << std::endl;
00051     }
00052     *mpFile << "..done!" << std::endl;
00053     mpFile->close();
00054 }
00055 
00056 void ProgressReporter::Update(double currentTime)
00057 {
00058     unsigned percentage = (unsigned)( (currentTime - mStartTime)/(mEndTime - mStartTime)*100 );
00059     if (mLastPercentage==UINT_MAX || percentage > mLastPercentage)
00060     {
00061         *mpFile << percentage << "% completed" << std::endl;
00062         mLastPercentage = percentage;
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 void ProgressReporter::PrintFinalising()
00067 {
00068     *mpFile << "Finalising.." << std::endl;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void ProgressReporter::PrintInitialising()
00072 {
00073     *mpFile << "Initialising.." << std::endl;
00074 }
